# Sheila Sitaram

![Sheila Sitaram's photo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2FSS_154d2042c1.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)

# Sheila Sitaram

Product

Sheila joins us from MongoDB where she led Customer Strategy within the go-to-market organization. Previously, she was a marketing leader at HashiCorp, management consultant at PwC, and creative director, producer, and 'renaissance woman' working with leading fashion and luxury brands to turn creative tailwinds into commercial impact.

Read through the key principles and ethos behind the Small Data movement. Small data and AI is more powerful than you think. Data and AI that was once "Big" can now be handled by a single machine.
